provenance.description: An object that specifies provenance information of the data contained.

alternateOf.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR Digital Object which is an alternate of the object referenced by digitalObjectLocation
alternateOf.title: Alternate of

checksum.description: A checksum used to validate the integrity of the data.
checksum.title: Checksum

dateModified.description: Date of the last modification. Date Format is ISO 8601.
dateModified.title: Last modified

digtalObjectLocationAccessProtocol.description: Additional information which can be used by an access client for accessing
digtalObjectLocationAccessProtocol.title: Digital Object Location Access Protocol

digitalObjectType.description: A PID pointing to a data type in a Data Type Registry describing the object referenced by digtalObject Location
digitalObjectType.title: Digital Object Type

hadPrimarySource.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR DO which is the primary source of the object referenced by digitalObjectLocation
hadPrimarySource.title: Primary Source

hasMetadata.description: One or more PIDs referring to related FAIR Digital Objects provding metadata for the object referenced by digitalObjectLocation. It is the innverse to isMetadata for
hasMetadata.title: Has Metadata

isMetadataFor.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR Digital Object decribing the object referenced by digitalObjectLocation. It is the inverse to hasMetadata
isMetadataFor.title: Is Metadata for

policy.description: A web-resolveable pointer to a policy object describing e.g. object access and modification policies
policy.title: Policy

provenanceGraph.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR DO which refers to the provenance graph of the object referenced by digitalObjectLocation
provenanceGraph.title: Provenance Graph

specializationOf.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR DO which is a specialization of the object referenced by digitalObjectLocation
specializationOf.title: Specialization of

version.description: Version of the object referenced by digitalObjectLocation
version.title: Version

wasDerivedFrom.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR Digital Object which the object referenced by digitalObjectLocation was derived from
wasDerivedFrom.title: Was derived from

wasRevisionOf.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR DO which is a revisionof the object referenced by digitalObjectLocation
wasRevisionOf.title: Was Revision of

wasQuotedFrom.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR DO from which the object referenced by digitalObjectLocation was folly or partly quoted.
wasQuotedFrom.title: Was quoted from

contributors.description: A list of objects that describe contributors and contributions. It contains title, email, date, object and comment.

title.description: Name/title of the contributor (name for a person, name or title for an organization).
title.title: Title

date.description: Date of the contribution. If the contribution took more than a day, use the date of the final contribiution. Date Format is ISO 8601.
date.title: Date

object.description: Target of contribution. Which part of the package was supplied/changed.
object.title: Object

comment.description: Free text comment on what has been done.
comment.title: Comment

contributors.title: Contributors

provenance.title: Provenance
